title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update.
EB: The software should show a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check or uncheck the checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the time it takes for the checked state to update and the cursor behavior during this process.
